* Iron Raptor turned her eyes back the vast expance of grassland then, now 
reduced to a charred and dead wasteland where battles raged MUCH too often 
for her pleasure.
But...this WAS a war so things like this were to be expected. Though, 
corrected as soon as possable.
Suddenly an idea poped into her mind and instantly her comm-link opened to a 
new Maximal she had seen.  Data-tracks already relaying information about 
him.*

" Tremmer..." * she spoke.* "...report to my position at once. I need your 
assistance."

* Right away she recieved a reply, though it was nearly cut off when she 
recieved a different transmission...from Hot Spot.
Listening she developed a thoughtful expression.
Just what did she have for those bots to do?
Hmm....
Suddenly it hit her.*

" Recieved. Report to my position. I have just the thing for you."
